item.title: My1stpost
item.description: Go-Live plan and balancing method - See: Go-Live Checklist doc. - Go-Live tasks: - A/R & A/P open invoices to be imported - Current inventory x item (OHQ, unit cost) - sub-ledgers balance to G/L in QB - Reconcile old/new systems. - P/Os expected to be received after Go-Live s/b entered into AQ. - S/Os expected to ship after Go-Live s/b entered into AQ. Data import review - Key fields / size limits: - Customer, Supplier: 7 chars.
